forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to mainly rain showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
